Articles.Content: So, Rimworld is quite an interesting "sci fi colony sim driven by an intelligent AI storyteller". The game is currently in pre-alpha and is subject to major changes in the near future. IÃ‚Â´ve really been enjoying this unfinished preview of Tynan Sylvesters imagination, and thus IÃ‚Â´m sharing the glory of its existence with our beloved KSP community. Well, unless everyone is already aware of the game due to Scott Manley the Magnificent. The game has gained quite a lot of popularity recently. Its Kickstarter was a astounding success, gathering more than ten times the required cash in pledges.
